title: In case of any accident at site during construction on account of failure of any component of building / structure, the reason for the same shall be ascertained by the following technical fact finding committee
clause_text: In case of any accident at site during construction on account of failure of any component of building / structure, the reason for the same shall be ascertained by the following technical fact finding committee.
section: Duties and Responsibilities of Geotechnical Engineer :
